root.name: Dimensity
root.description: OverviewDimensity, at first glance, appears to only be a hack and slash action-rpg. The core gameplay is much more diverse, however. Players will find themselves looking for gold caches, building unit-spawning buildings, and rallying their forces against their enemies. The player's "hero" character is still just as customizable as in many other action-rpgs. The hero levels up, gains spells or skills, uses potions, and finds new armor and weapons. Enemies Fyrd Battlemaster Vile Thorn Torturer Shield Breaker Shaman Scavenger Poisonous Locustus Hive Dweller

similar_games.game: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light
